h2. My Desktop Buckets

{{html:
<table ng-app="myApp" ng-controller="ListDesktopBucketsController" class="table table-condensed table-hover">
    <thead>
        <tr>
            <th></th>
            <th></th>
            <th>Name</th>
            <th>Number of users</th>
            <th>Storage</th>
            <th>Number of data locations</th>
        </tr>
    </thead>
    <tbody>
        <tr ng-repeat="bucket in buckets">
            <td><a href="Main Office">Edit Package</a></td>
            <td><a href="Connecting">Manage</a></td>
            <td>{[bucket.projectName]}</td>
            <td>{[bucket.users.length]}</td>
            <td>{[bucket.storage]}GB</td>
            <td>{[numOfDataLocations(bucket)]}</td>
        </tr>
    </tbody>
</table>
}}

||  ||  || Name || Number of users || Storage || Number of data locations ||
|| [Edit Package|Main Office] | [Manage|Connecting] | Main Office | 7 | 140GB | 2 |
|| [Edit Package|Main Office] | [Manage|Connecting] | Sattelite Office | 5 | 100GB | 1 |
